sentences.sContent: The idea of working abroad really appeals to me.
sentences.sCn: 去国外工作的这个想法对我很有吸引力。

sentences.sContent: ...retail and entertainment -especially when combined with improved infra structure for cyclists and public transit-makes them appeal to a more affluent demographic...
...and why do these cities have so much appeal 18-hour cities combine the best of 24-hour and 9-5 cities...
...For what purpose does Fred Nahwooksy appeal for more funding...
...The theory is that smoking should be stripped of any appeal to discourage new generations from starting in the first place...
...new technologies that are building upon existing technology have not found their footing well enough to appeal to a mass audience...

synos.tran: 呼吁，恳求；[法]上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判
呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；[法]上诉；诉诸裁判

phrases.pCn: 引人入胜，有吸引力，有魅力

remMethod.val: ap(表加强) ＋ peal(鸣响) → 呼吁

words.tran: 吸引人的；动人的；引起兴趣的；恳求似的

有感染力；吸引人；哀诉；恳求

trans.tranCn: 求助，诉请；要求；有吸引力
trans.tranOther: if someone or something appeals to you, they seem attractive and interesting

trans.tranCn: 控诉，移交上级法院审理
trans.tranOther: to make a formal request to a court or someone in authority asking for a decision to be changed

trans.tranCn: 吸引力； 呼吁； 上诉
